title: Media Resources
tag-2: Get in touch with our Public Affairs team, access insights and more.
tag-4: PLEASE NOTE: Citi Public Affairs officers are available for media inquiries only and are not staffed to respond to customer or sales inquiries.For all non-media related inquiries, please visit https://citigroup.com/global/contact-us for the appropriate contact information.
tag-5: Learn about the principles guiding our strategic refresh and read CEO Jane Fraser's letter to shareholders.
